    D & Y Textile (Malaysia) Sdn Bhd Vacancies Production Supervisor

    November 14, 2020

    TOC

    • Job Description
    • Company Overview
    • How To Apply

    D & Y Textile (Malaysia) Sdn Bhd is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Production Supervisor position. If you currently looking for new job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

    Job Description

    • Candidate must possess at least Primary/Secondary School/SPM/"O" Level in Textile/Fashion Design or equivalent.
    • At least 1 Year(s) of working experience in the related field is required for this position.
    • Required Skill(s): leadership, supervisory
    • Preferably Non-Executive specialized in Manufacturing/Production Operations or equivalent.
    • Lead, train and manage production team to achieve production target
    • Yield sustaining and troubleshooting
    • Assist in planning and execution of production schedule, taking into account of production needs and individual capabilities
    • Ensure operations adhere strictly to regulatory compliance, standard operating procedures, maintenance programs, quality, general housekeeping/5s, safety requirements & standards, Company polices, rules and regulations
    • Perform other or specified duties as directed by Production Manager, or other appropriate supervisory personnel.
    • Conduct and assist investigations into safety related issues as needed and as directed
    • Possess good interpersonal and communication skills
    • No work experience required but candidates with few years in supervisory position is preferred.
    • Candidate must willing to work on rotating shift basis

    Company Overview

    D&Y is a China company investment of USD200 million to built up the larger textile enterprise in this region. Located in Sedenak Industrial Park, Kulai, Johor. Parent company of D&Y Textile Group in China is a collection of Chinese textile,clothing, import & export trade, trannation production & trading in one of the major intergrated enterprise , existing staff of more than 10,000. 2014 sales revenue of 3.5 billion RMB, profit of 150 million RMB, import trade value at USD220 million.

    How To Apply

    If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
    Hope you find your dream job in Johor - Others.
